name: DoomDoom's Day
description:
DoomDoom's Day is a two players action shooter game.

Objective

Protect your base, slash your enemies and kill the final boss

Controls

Keyboard: 

Player 1: WASD to move, R to shoot and T to dash

Player 2:  Arrows to move, O to shoot and P to dash

Controller:

Player 1 and 2: Analog to move, A to shoot and B to dash

**The game have a better experience on controller**

Have a great game :)
